alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Lapeer; Livingston; Oakland; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 12:01AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lapeer, northwestern Wayne, Oakland, Livingston, Genesee and northern Washtenaw Counties through 100 AM EDT... At 1201 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Birch Run to near Hartland to near Chelsea. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hartland around 1205 AM EDT. Clio, Mount Morris and Beecher around 1210 AM EDT. Milford around 1215 AM EDT. Ann Arbor and Otisville around 1220 AM EDT. Columbiaville, Otter Lake and Clarkston around 1225 AM EDT. Salem, Dixboro and West Bloomfield around 1230 AM EDT. Pontiac around 1235 AM EDT. North Branch, Canton, Royal Oak and Birmingham around 1240 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Franklin, Keego Harbor, Goodland Township, Waterford, Plainfield, Rankin, Hudson Mills Metropark, Holly State Recreation Area, Commerce and Auburn Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
